summary.span: 为 和 路由事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and routed events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示实现的命令逻辑的方法 。 represents the method that implements the command logic of a . 通过从命令分离实现逻辑，可从不同的源和类型调用命令并实现命令逻辑的集中。Separating the implementation logic from the command allows the command to be invoked from different sources and types and enables the centralization of command logic. 此事件数据类还用于 和 。This event data class is also used for and . 但大多数实际处理程序将处理 来自特定的事件 ，而不是在 级别工作。But most practical handlers will handle the events from a particular , rather than work at the level. 有关命令的详细信息，请参阅[命令概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview)。For more information on commanding, see [Commanding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，它将 在执行命令时打开。The following example creates an that opens a when the command is executed. [!code-csharp[commandwithhandler#CommandHandlerExecutedHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/commandWithHandler/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandhandlerexecutedhandler)] [!code-vb[commandwithhandler#CommandHandlerExecutedHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/commandWithHandler/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#commandhandlerexecutedhandler)]

span.span: Gets the command that was invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与事件关联的命令可以强制转换为的特定实现 ，如 ，如果该类型已知，则为。The command associated with the event can be cast to the specific implementation of , such as a , if the type is known. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 用于处理多个命令的。The following example creates an that handles multiple commands. 处理程序将检查 上的属性 ，以确定要调用的方法。The handler checks the property on the to determine which method to call. span.span: Gets data parameter of the command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示由特定命令定义的泛型数据参数。This property represents a generic data parameter that is defined by the particular command. 如果此参数不是必需的，则 `null` 可以传递。If this parameter is not needed, `null` can be passed. 通常， 用于在执行命令时将特定信息传递给命令。Normally, the is used to pass specific information to the command when it is executed. 数据的类型由命令定义。The type of the data is defined by the command. ## Examples 下面的示例 为自定义创建 。The following example creates an for a custom . 处理程序使用通过 传递到处理程序的控件的当前时间和属性来更新 。The handler updates a with the current time and the property of a control that is passed to the handler through the . [!code-csharp[invalidaterequerywithdispatchertimer#InvalidateSampleExecuted](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InvalidateRequeryWithDispatcherTimer/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#invalidatesampleexecuted)] [!code-vb[invalidaterequerywithdispatchertimer#InvalidateSampleExecuted](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InvalidateRequeryWithDispatcherTimer/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#invalidatesampleexecuted)]
